parsed.title: O mito forjado de Simão de Trento
parsed.summary: Um breve mergulho na manipulação que transformou a morte de uma criança em um símbolo de ódio milenar. Descubra como o poder e a imprensa criaram um mito que ainda ecoa nos dias de hoje.

scenes.narration: Uma criança morta, um mito forjado, ninguém sabe quem realmente culpou neste século.
scenes.visualDescription: Dark cinematic digital painting, concept art style, heavy chiaroscuro lighting, painterly textures with cinematic composition, moody and atmospheric, dim medieval alley at night, a small, cracked wooden doll lying on wet cobblestones, faint candlelight flickering from a distant window, shadows stretching across the stone.
scenes.motionDescription: Slow dolly forward toward the doll, rain droplets drifting, shadows shifting with the light.
scenes.audioDescription: Distant church bells with reverb, soft rain patter, low wind sighing.

scenes.narration: O bispo autorizou a confiscação dos bens judaicos, financiando sua própria catedral com.
scenes.visualDescription: Dark cinematic digital painting, concept art style, heavy chiaroscuro lighting, painterly textures with cinematic composition, moody and atmospheric, bishop's study filled with heavy oak desk, ledger opened, gold coins spilling, a wax seal bearing the bishop's insignia, candle flame trembling, walls lined with religious tapestries.
scenes.motionDescription: Gentle pan left across the desk, candle flames gently swaying, dust particles drifting in the light beam.
scenes.audioDescription: Paper rustling, faint heartbeat rhythm, distant organ drone.

scenes.narration: Impressões de madeira espalharam a história, transformando o menino em símbolo de ódio eterno.
scenes.visualDescription: Dark cinematic digital painting, concept art style, heavy chiaroscuro lighting, painterly textures with cinematic composition, moody and atmospheric, 15th‑century woodcut workshop, a large hand‑press printing sheets with the child's image, ink smudges on the floor, shafts of cold light through narrow windows, a solitary printer watching.
scenes.motionDescription: Slow zoom in on a printed sheet, ink smearing subtly, light filtering through shutters.
scenes.audioDescription: Mechanical press clanking, eerie pads humming, distant murmur of whispers.

scenes.visualDescription: Dark cinematic digital painting, concept art style, heavy chiaroscuro lighting, painterly textures with cinematic composition, moody and atmospheric, black screen with white serif text centered reading "The Gap Files.", faint vignette around edges.
scenes.motionDescription: Static fade in, subtle film grain drifting.

backgroundMusic.prompt: Dark Ambient, Low Drone Synths, Sparse Piano Notes, Tension Strings, Eerie Pads, Subtle Heartbeat Rhythm, Minor Key, well-arranged composition, 70 BPM
